name: ProtEGGt
description:
ProtEGGt the egg at all costs! Purchase upgrades, and shoot down the rocks before they smash the sacred egg to pieces!

I didn't have time to properly balance the game, so some parts could be too hard or too easy.

MADE FOR ScoreSpace Jam #17!

Didn't get time to add an online leaderboard but highscores are still there.

Theme: Protect

CONTROLS:
  • Press Z, X or left click on a rock to shoot it. (enemies take 4 hits to kill at base damage)
  • Press TAB to view upgrades menu.
  • When auto-fire is unlocked, hold C or right mouse button to use it.
